# providesAudioData

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that specifies whether to capture audio during the AR session.

## Declaration

```swift
var providesAudioData: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

To receive and handle captured audio data, your session delegate must implement the [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARSessionObserver/session(_:didOutputAudioSampleBuffer:)] method.
title: providesAudioData
